text: Mucilaginibacter angelicae is a Gram-negative and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Mucilaginibacter which has been isolated from the rhizosphere of the plant Angelica polymorpha. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Mucilaginibacter angelicae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Mucilaginibacter angelicae
